title: Episode #82: Brad Smith on the Balance of National Security and Privacy
itunes:title: Episode #82: Brad Smith on the Balance of National Security and Privacy
itunes:subtitle: Brad Smith, Executive Vice President and General Counsel of Microsoft, gave a keynote address last week at Brookings entitled “The Future of Global Technology, Privacy, and Regulation.”
description:
Brad Smith, Executive Vice President and General Counsel of Microsoft, gave a keynote address last week at Brookings entitled “The Future of Global Technology, Privacy, and Regulation.”
